languages.text:
On 75% or more Wounds wielder gains +3 Deflection and +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} Parry
Base Armour Property: +1 Deflection against melee attacks

traits.locale_text:
On 75% or more Wounds wielder gains +3 Deflection and +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} Parry
Base Armour Property: +1 Deflection against melee attacks

languages.text: While the wearer has 75% or more {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +3 and their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
languages.original_text: Пока у персонажа 75% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} или больше, его {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} увеличено на 3, а {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} — на {uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Базовое свойство: +1 к отражению против атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While the wielder has 75% or more wounds, their deflection is increased by +3 and their parry is increased by +(Coercion / 4)%. Base armour property: +1 deflection against melee attacks.

While the wearer has 75% or more {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +3 and their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %75 veya üstündeyse {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri +3, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değeri ise +%{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı +1 saptırma.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %75 veya üstündeyse {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri +3, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değeri ise +%{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı +1 saptırma.

Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} %75 veya üstündeyse {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri +3, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değeri ise +%{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı +1 saptırma.

languages.text: Mientras el portador tenga al menos el 75 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} aumenta en +3 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} %. Propiedad básica de armadura: +1 de desvío contra {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不低于75%时，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+1偏转。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不低于75%时，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+1偏转。

languages.text: Tant que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur sont supérieures à 75 %, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} augmente de +3 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} de +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Propriété d'armure de base : +1 à la Déflexion contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が75%以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+3増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対するディフレクション+1。
languages.original_text: While the wearer has 75% or more {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +3 and their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の傷が75%以上の場合、ディフレクションが+3増加し、受け流しが+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：近接攻撃に対するディフレクション+1。
使用者の傷が75%以上の場合、ディフレクションが+3増加し、受け流しが+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：近接攻撃に対するディフレクション+1。
使用者の傷が75%以上の場合、ディフレクションが+3増加し、受け流しが+{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：近接攻撃に対するディフレクション+1。

languages.text: Hat der Träger 75 % oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} um +3 und sein {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} um +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c} %. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +1 % Ablenkung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.
